snippet: The Human Resources Administration and the Social Services Department will join under one commissioner, Steven Banks.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio announces consolidation of Human Resources Admin, city's welfare agency, and Social Services Dept, which provides services for homeless, under single commissioner, Steven Banks; effort will save millions of dollars and provide streamlined case management for New Yorkers moving out of homeless shelters and into permanent housing.
lead_paragraph: The Human Resources Administration and the Social Services Department will join under one commissioner, Steven Banks.

headline.main: New York City Combining Agencies for Homeless and Welfare Services
headline.print_headline: City Combining  Two Agencies  That Combat Homelessness
